prompt_base: elegant East-Asian woman, slender physique, long straight black hair in neat bun, captivating eyes, determined expression, 8k cinematic photo, soft studio lighting
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin texture, delicate bone structure, individual hair strands, realistic blue silk qipao fabric, soft pink silk scarf texture, sharp lines on embroidery
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, messy bun, low quality, blurry face, (unrealistic hair:1.2), too youthful, exaggerated eyes, modern clothes
